title: Simple organisms: Bacteria (Revised)
brief_description: Looks at the discovery of bacteria and examines their structure and means of feeding. Binary fission and antibiotics are examined, as are some uses of bacteria, nitrogen fixing, cheese making and chemical manufacture.
